div1.fw: Nomination d'un Consul Générral des Etats-Unis.
div1.p: JW. Florum, actuell- ment Consul des Etats-Unis d'Amériqe á Weimar est nommé Consul Général á Boma. avertir officieusement gouvenor Général. JW. Florum et favorable á l'Etat.

div1.fw: Nomination of Consulate General of the United States
div1.p: The American section of the Congo Reform Association has long since multiplied by demand in face of the establishment, in this easy goal to understand, that a Consulate General from the US in the Free State.-

I received from you a telegram particular sources knowing that the account was said to be presented for this door adherent to the Reform Association was not accepted but that the choice of Senate I put on the person from US to It appeared that Hr. favorable to the State.
